column5: We'll be pulling a small 8' x 5' trailer into Canada with all of our fishing gear, etc. Are there any special regs in Canada on small trailers that we don't have here in the states? I had heard that you have to tie down the safety chains a special way. Three days and a wakeup to Ear Falls.

Hi. they never bother us and the boat. I have heard though they prefer the safety chain that is more than a S hook on the end. ZI guess some kind of locking dodad would be good so the chain does not fall off the tow vehicle.
